page.title: 08Southend:Accommodation
page.content:
In Southend there are many types of accomodation ranging from old people's homes to modern detached houses. For tourists and guests there are many other buildings where they can stay:
no:2 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 hotels :|___________ (11) guest house :|_________________ (15) inn :|_____ (6) public house:|_____ (6)
Of the people asked who lived in this area 40% had lived here more than 40 years,37% between 20 and 40 years and 23% less than 20 years.The oldest houses in this area were built around 1920 and new houses are still being built.
